name: OWL INVEST - Integrated Wealth Management Portal
description: Product development for a Top 100 Financial Advisor RIA, creating a scalable solution to address multifold challenges including scalability, transition to modern UX leveraging advanced UI frameworks for superior user experience.
challenge: Architecture limiting scalability, ineffective platform transition, and lack of superior user experience with latest UI and UX frameworks. Need for modern, intuitive interface to serve wealth management clients effectively.
solution: Bank linking process with portfolio integration
Flutter upgrade from Ionic for enhanced mobile experience
AI Chat bot implementation for customer support
Advisor and client portals on both web and mobile platforms
Automation of all paperwork through sophisticated workflows
outcomes: Increased user experience through modern UI/UX frameworks
Comprehensive advisor and client portals on web and mobile
Enhanced mobile experience through Flutter upgrade
